text: Milan Šašik (17 September 1952 – 14 July 2020) was a Slovak-born Ukrainian Ruthenian Catholic hierarch. He was the Bishop of the Eparchy of Mukacheve from 2002 until his death. He was born in Lehota, Czechoslovakia. Šašik died on 14 July 2020, aged 67.Щойно відійшов до Господа наш батько…. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Slovak people Category:Ukrainian Christian clergy Category:Eastern Catholic bishops
title: Milan Šašik
